titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the rotunda of the United States Capitol to be used on January 20, 1989, in connection with the proceedings and ceremonies for the inauguration of the President-elect and the Vice President-elect of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/8/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol on January 20, 1989, by the Joint Congressional Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies in connection with the proceedings and ceremonies for the inauguration of the President-elect and the Vice President-elect.
